entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You found signs of where the hiking party disappeared in the mountains near Doaba Guerfel.
entries.journal_entry_description: People have been disappearing near Doaba Guerfel. Find out why.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Angela's husband was lost in a wilderness hike. Get as much information as you can from her.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Myron Beech runs the base camp that the missing hikers started from. Talk to him and find out if he has any information.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Myron gave you the coordinates to 3 locations where the group checked in from. Go to those locations and see if there are any clues.
entries.task02_waypoint_name: First Stop on the Hiking Trail
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Look around to see if there's anything...unnatural.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Search the Ground for Anything Interesting
entries.task03_waypoint_name: First Stop on the Hiking Trail
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: This image recorder is intact and shows several images of the Corellia mountains and a group image of the hiking tour. It appears to have been forgotten here. One of the men in the group matches the description of Angela's husband.
entries.task04_message_box_text: This image recorder is intact and shows several images of the Corellia mountains and a group image of the hiking tour. It appears to have been forgotten here. One of the men in the group matches the description of Angela's husband.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Follow the hiking path to the next recorded location.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Go to the Next Stop on the Path
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Nothing strikes you as particularly odd here, just tracks.
entries.task06_message_box_text: There's nothing really interesting here. It looks like the hikers stopped here, but nothing out of the ordinary remains.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Go to the last stop recorded on the hike. This appears to be where the communications ended.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Looks like the group was in the middle of eating lunch. Find out why communication was cut off.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: You have an answer as to why the group could not communicate with the base camp. It looks like there was a struggle of some kind; drag marks that could be either sacks or bodies.
entries.task09_message_box_text: You have an answer as to why the group could not communicate with the base camp. It looks like there was a struggle of some kind; drag marks that could be either sacks or bodies.
entries.task10_comm_message_text: This is a disturbing discovery. I'm scanning the area now. There's a structure nearby. Check it out. Maybe there's a clue there.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: This is a disturbing discovery. I'm scanning the area now. There's a structure nearby. Check it out. Maybe there's a clue there.
entries.task10_journal_entry_title: You got a message from Security Commander Talte
